amendment.description: Amendment requires the Secretary to reserve 5 percent of section 102 grant funds for grants to local educational agencies serving those geographic areas with significant economic distress or those recovering from a natural disaster.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 10 printed in House Report 111-106 to require the Secretary to reserve 5 percent of section 102 grant funds for grants to local educational agencies serving geographic areas with significant economic distress or recovering from a natural disaster.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Bright amendment (A010) Agreed to by recorded vote: 433 - 0 (Roll no. 256).
